trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the arguments of a <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 包装 <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> 委托的参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code-behind page for the XAML file creates a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601> with custom methods that are called when changes occur to data that is bound to the binding collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 XAML 文件代码隐藏页使用当更改绑定到绑定集合的数据时调用的自定义方法来创建 <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event occurs, the supplied method prevents an item that has been removed from the binding collection from being deleted from the data service.
trans-unit.target: 当发生 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> 事件时，提供的方法阻止从数据服务删除已从绑定集合移除的项。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.PropertyChanged> event occurs, the `ShipDate` value is validated to ensure that changes are not made to orders that have already shipped.
trans-unit.target: 当发生 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.PropertyChanged> 事件时，验证 `ShipDate` 值以确保不对已发货的订单进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The following XAML code defines the window for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 XAML 代码定义上例的窗口。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction" /> value that indicates how the collection was changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示集合的更改方式的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how the collection was changed.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示集合的更改方式的值。

trans-unit.source: Only the values <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add> and <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove> are supported.
trans-unit.target: 仅支持值 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add> 和 <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已更改的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the collection that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已更改的集合引用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" /> that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 与已更改的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext" /> 相关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the collection that has changed
trans-unit.target: 与已更改的集合相关联的上下文

trans-unit.source: The navigation property on the source object that references the collection that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 引用已更改集合的源对象上的导航属性。

trans-unit.source: The navigation property name.
trans-unit.target: 导航属性名称。

trans-unit.source: The source object that references the target object in the collection by using a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: 使用导航属性引用集合中的目标对象的源对象。

trans-unit.source: The source object.
trans-unit.target: 源对象。

trans-unit.source: The entity set of the source object.
trans-unit.target: 源对象的实体集。

trans-unit.source: An entity set name.
trans-unit.target: 实体集名称。

trans-unit.source: The entity object in the collection that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 已更改集合中的实体对象。

trans-unit.source: The changed entity object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的已更改实体对象。

trans-unit.source: The entity set name of the object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中对象的实体集名称。

trans-unit.source: An entity set name.
trans-unit.target: 实体集名称。
